channel.title: Website of Kazuki Motohashi
channel.description: Recent content on Website of Kazuki Motohashi

item.description: 元橋 一輝 略歴 2018年〜 タフツ大学経済学部・フレッチャースクール 博士課程 2014年〜2018年 三菱総合研究所 環境・エネルギー研究本部、海外事業本部等 研究員
Welcome! I am a PhD Candidate in the Department of Economics and the Fletcher School, Tufts University.

Work in Progress Unintended Consequences of Sanitation: Externalities on Water Quality and Health in India Impact of Municipal Mergers on Pollution Control: Evidence from Water Quality Change in Japan (with Michiyoshi Toya) Misperceived Cost and Social Interaction in Technology Adoption: Evidence from Latrine Usage in India VIIRS and the Future of Night Lights Data in Economics (with Paul Brimble, Axel Ezimendi-Larrinaga, Adam Storeygard) The Lasting Impact of Temperature on Health Investment: Evidence from Sanitation in India Others Replication in R of the code in the Banerjee et al.
